players.name: Shohei Ohtani
clues: This player was the first pick in the 2012 NPB draft by the Hokkaido Nippon-Ham Fighters
He won back-to-back AL MVP awards in 2021 and 2023 as a two-way player
In 2023, he hit 44 home runs while also posting a 10-5 record with 167 strikeouts as a pitcher
He signed a record-breaking 10-year, $700 million contract before the 2024 season
He joined the Dodgers in 2024 and won his first World Series title
The Japanese superstar known as 'Shotime' wears number 17

players.name: Aaron Judge
clues: He was adopted as an infant and raised in Linden, California
He set the AL single-season home run record with 62 in 2022
Standing 6'7", he's one of the tallest position players in MLB history
He was drafted by the Yankees in the first round of the 2013 draft out of Fresno State
He became the 16th captain in Yankees history in 2023
This towering right fielder wears number 99 and his fans sit in the 'Judge's Chambers'

players.name: Mookie Betts
clues: He's an accomplished bowler who has competed in PBA events with a 300 game to his credit
He won both an MVP award and a World Series with the Red Sox in 2018
He's a six-time Gold Glove winner who transitioned to shortstop in 2024
He was traded from Boston to the Dodgers in a blockbuster deal before the 2020 season
He won his second World Series ring with LA in 2024
This versatile star wears number 50 and his real first name is Markus

players.name: Ronald Acuña Jr.
clues: His father and uncles all played professional baseball in Venezuela
He won NL MVP in 2023, becoming the first player with 40 HR and 70 SB in a season
He hit a home run in his first MLB at-bat on April 25, 2018
He signed a team-friendly 8-year, $100 million extension in 2019
He tore his ACL in May 2024 while playing for the Braves
This Venezuelan outfielder wears number 13 and is nicknamed 'El Abusador'

players.name: Mike Trout
clues: He grew up in Millville, New Jersey, where his high school jersey was retired
He's a three-time AL MVP (2014, 2016, 2019) and 11-time All-Star
He won the 2012 AL Rookie of the Year with 129 runs scored and 49 stolen bases
He was drafted 25th overall by the Angels in 2009 and has never played for another team

players.name: Freddie Freeman
clues: He was born in Fountain Valley, California but moved to Canada at age 10

He had a remarkable 2023 NLCS, hitting .400 with 4 HR against the Diamondbacks
He played 12 seasons with the Braves before signing with the Dodgers in 2022
He was the 2024 World Series MVP with a historic performance
